name: Poison Knife [2]
description: The blade with a purple shine makes people feel scared. The knife is covered with strong poison.
effect: auto attack has a large probability to set targets into poisoning state,For Refining ＋1, ignore Def ＋2%

name: Poisoned Duke's Mask
description: The Duke is an illegitimate son of the Pope and an unknown woman. Due to an encounter during childhood, He became a famous careerist. Not only did he have a forbidden relationship with his own sister, but he also used his sister as a tool to marry off her husband and poisoned the man after grabbing his territory. The method was extremely cruel and filled with a perverted aesthetic.

name: Poker Album
description: Use to gain a random card

name: Poker Face
description: The eyes and the mouth are the same, As if the facial expression is out of the world. When you hear cold jokes without anticipation, you can try to wear it.

name: Poker Face Blueprint
description: The eyes and the mouth are the same, As if the facial expression is out of the world. When you hear cold jokes without anticipation, you can try to wear it.

name: Pole Axe [1]
description: Large single-handed guns, long guns plus sickles can be used as the holistic weapons for various attacks.

name: Pole Axe [2]
description: Large single-handed guns, long guns plus sickles can be used as the holistic weapons for various attacks.

name: Poo Poo Hat
description: It's not polite to call it as animal's crap. So it's referred as excrement.

description: It's not polite to call it as animal's crap. So it's referred as excrement.

name: Poo Poo Hat [1]
description: Animal's excrete or something, they care all called feces. It will be released when players are attacked by an enemy.

name: Pope Music
description: Cute is justice! Become the Pope music and let everyone warship your lovely voice.

name: Poring Blessing Box
description: Poring prepared this gift box for the adventurer as a token of gratitude. It's not big but full of their goodwill.

name: Poring Celebration GiftBox
description: An exquisite box with the scent of early spring and markings of peach blossoms on it. It's said to hold Poring's treasures!

name: Poring Doll
description: A doll designed like the popular Poring Monster. It permanently increases the character's PHY Atk by 25 points and cannot be traded.
